name: Nippon Ecchi Jigsaw
description:
Introduction:


Nippon Ecchi Jigsaw is simple puzzle jigsaw game. Game first version contains over 10 different anime/ecchi style images. Some have no mature content and some image have more mature content, like boobs. Use just mouse and drag&drop jigsaw pieces and try to solve every images.
There are 6 different puzzle sizes.

Features:

- Only basic settings
- Over 10 different images.
- Anime girl and boys images
